t: If You Need a New Vacuum, I Can't Recommend One of These Picks from Shark Enough
s: Compared to other vacuum brands, like Dyson and Tineco, Shark's vacuums sit at a lower and more budget-friendly price point. Our picks cost between $90 and $550. To compare, our favorite Dyson vacuums start at $300 when the vacuum is on sale. For that reason, it's even sweeter when you can score a Shark vacuum on sale. Shark vacuums go on sale very often, too. You can expect deep discounts during Memorial Day, Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Amazon...
